#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main1()
{
  int n;
  cin>>n;
  string ans="a";
  int count=0;
  while(count<n)
    {
      string toadd=" ";
      if(ans[0]!='z')
	{
	  toadd[0]=ans[0]+1;
	  ans=toadd+ans;
	}
      else
	{
	  toadd="ba";
	  ans=toadd+ans;
	}
      count++;
    }
  cout<<ans<<endl;
  return 0;
}

int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    main1();
  return 0;
}
